properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL out 20 NM; Coastal waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to Fernandina Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 14 at 3:06AM EST until February 16 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 5 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL out to 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 3 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM EST SUNDAY
